feed.title: Colanode Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Colanode: v0.2.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix docker compose path in readme by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/100
  • Add unread states in sidebar menu by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/106
  • Implement save file by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/108
  • Fixes in document and node updates merge jobs by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/109
  • Add docs how to run Colanode locally by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/110
  • Close file tab on delete by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/111
  • Update packages by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/112
  • Add placeholders for password inputs by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/113

Full Changelog: https://github.com/colanode/colanode/compare/v0.2.4...v0.2.5

entry.title: New release for Colanode: v0.2.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Preview audio files by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/114
  • Reorder space children in sidebar by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/115
  • Allow database name field update by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/116

Full Changelog: https://github.com/colanode/colanode/compare/v0.2.5...v0.2.6

entry.title: New release for Colanode: v0.2.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Filter and sort by name by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/117
  • Fix code block renderer by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/119

Full Changelog: https://github.com/colanode/colanode/compare/v0.2.6...v0.2.7

entry.title: New release for Colanode: v0.2.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update discord link by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/120
  • Group board views by multi-select, collaborator or creator and some calendar view improvements by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/121
  • Add number of records for each board column by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/122
  • Show the count and a list of records that have no value for calendar group field by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/124
  • Implement collaborator, created by, updated by and updated at field filters by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/126

Full Changelog: https://github.com/colanode/colanode/compare/v0.2.7...v0.2.8

entry.title: New release for Colanode: v0.2.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix docker compose bucket creation in minio by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/129
  • Implement workspace and account settings in sidebar by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/130
  • Workspace storage limits by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/140
  • Fix editor placeholder color by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/141
  • Improve browser not supported message by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/142
  • Add a message that Colanode is not supported in mobile devices by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/143
  • Use pino for server logging by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/144
  • Add workspace configs by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/145
  • Disable all ai features temporarily by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/146
  • Add new config options in helm chart by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/147
  • Fix sidebar header action button display by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/148
  • Fix server feature support check by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/150

Full Changelog: https://github.com/colanode/colanode/compare/v0.2.8...v0.2.9
